reviewText: I watched this guy occasionally on EWTN, marveling that anyone could consider him anything but a complete arrogant fraud. Now he is leaving the priesthood and starting his own thing. And his followers are bereft and crazed. Bad religion is bad religion, and it looks like bad religion. This is not rocket science, just honest assessment.

On the Saturday before Palm Sunday, Our Lady of Lourdes Catholic Church in Beulah, Colorado conducted a day-long retreat on the Easter Triduum for our RCIA group.  Fr. Corapi's three-part video was a part of the retreat.  The group was familiar with Fr. Corapi because we viewed his DVD, "Behold, Your Mother," during our discussion on Marian dogma.  They can't get enough of Fr. Corapi and want more!
